About Me

I'M A STOCK BROKER,

ADVISOR.

I am Katherine Anne Weatherford. A Financial Consultant and Stock Broker with over 20 years of experience working with 3 reputable brokerage corporations in the U.S. At the moment, I partner with ADVICE AND PLANNING SERVICES (CRD#:20472) where I help clients meet their desired financial targets with strategic investing in the stock, digital & foreign exchange market. I have passed 4 Broker Qualification examinations with registered licenses in the United States.
